lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Hey. Lookin' for a map?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Oh, it's you again.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Feel like we keep on runnin' into each other.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Thanks for the purchase.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Nice doing business.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Come by again if y'find something interesting.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'got an eye for these things. Thanks.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Thanks for the purchase. (Why'd that item look familiar...?)

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Hm? Y'said this was yours?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...Dunno what you're talking 'bout.

after selling a lost item, after Quingee.key: after selling a lost item, after Quingee is a regular

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...That was yours? It was just lying 'round the mountain.

after selling a lost item, friendship wi.key: after selling a lost item, friendship with Wander

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'gotta make sure you're properly prepared t'climb the peak because otherwise, you'll just knock out and lose everything again.

after selling a lost item, friendship wi.key: after selling a lost item, friendship with Wander 2

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Be more careful 'round the mountain, okay? I can't keep on picking these things up for you forever.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: The Throat's caves are difficult t'navigate. Would be best t'get a light.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: That bridge near the river got repaired recently, but... be careful.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: The steps're slippery if you're not paying attention.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Don't underestimate it.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'know, at the top of the Peak, there's...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Well, never mind. Might be best t'see for yourself.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Mm? Well, the town's pretty nice... It'll grow bigger before y'know it.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Don't think I've seen a Quingee as adventerous as you before...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: (Whistling)  ...You a fan of singing, like Cash?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'should stop by more often so I can get some practice with the Old Language.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Town Hall's pretty helpful. Might be a good place to take a break after running 'round so often.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: The Trading Post offers a lotta stuff, but honestly, the most thing that they have in stock is gossip.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Have y'seen the frog at the Post yet?  Not Bullfrog. The actual frog. Bullfrog Junior. Maybe you'd get along. I should check on him...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Bullfrog's pretty funny, don't y'think? Makes getting the mail and doing groceries less of a drag.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Tian's Corner has some pretty good produce. Pan Qing got a bunch from places overseas.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'should try Pan Qing's cooking if y'have the chance. The tofu's real good, but everything she cooks is great.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: If y'need help, just ask the Fire Station. Zane's real reliable.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Fire Station's got some beds and stuff t'rest on. Sometimes some food, too.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Lotta volunteers there like t'cook, apparently.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Be careful goin' up.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Zane overworks himself, so don't cause him too much trouble by knockin' out, okay?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Noah sells his own scarves and stuff, from what I hear. They look pretty high quality.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: If you're gonna be comin' up here this often, y'should check the Meteorlogical Institute for the forecast. Piper's pretty accurate with those things.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: There's that new cafe down at Acorn, heard that their coffee's pretty good. Like, they have the fancy type'a coffee.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...Maybe I should head over...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Have y'met Oz yet...? They know 'bout the mountain the most outta everyone.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: If y'see Oz, y'should lend 'em some company for a bit. They'll appreciate it.

meeting Cashew for the first time.key: meeting Cashew for the first time

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: My Quingee? She's training t'be a messenger bird.

lines.name: Cashew
lines.text: Chirp! (Nice to meet you!)

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Play nice with Cash, yeah?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: You and Cash seem t'be gettin' along well... visit her again sometime when you're not busy climbin'.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ... Better not be doin' something stupid again - huh?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Ah, sorry. Didn't see y'there.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...Hey, if y'see a redhead with goggles climbing the peak... lemme know. Seriously.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...'Bout me?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Hah... not much t'say, really.

about Wander 2, after Quingee becomes a.key: about Wander 2, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Yeah, I've been 'round Utlus. 'm just a traveler, nothing more.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: When 'm done with the maps of Galinn Peak, then I'll...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: No, never mind. Forget I said anything.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Hey, careful with those.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Maps take a while t'make, so if y'break it, y'buy it.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'keep on lookin' at the maps... can y'guys even read?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Got maps of most of the other areas in the valley. Not all of 'em, though.

about maps 4, after Quingee becomes a re.key: about maps 4, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: The maps for the Throat are still in progress... sorry, can't really give 'em t'you yet.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Charting the entire valley's difficult, but someone's gotta do it.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'can prob'ly find a hat or somethin' for this rain, right? Umbrellas are gonna be too big for you.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Nice day out. Good for travelin'.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Feel like takin' a nap...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Hard t'see stars out on a day like this...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'guys can't fly, but don't get carried away by the wind, there.

on a windy day 2, after Quingee becomes.key: on a windy day 2, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: This windy weather's pretty common in the Temperate Zone...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Hey, why're y'still climbing in this weather?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'know it's storming, right?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Don't say I didn't warn you.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Back here again when the weather's like this? Y'got more guts than I thought.

meeting Quingee for the first time.key: meeting Quingee for the first time

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...Huh? Y'wanna buy something? If a Quingee wants t'buy something and they have the money, no reason t'say no, right?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'sure come by this mountain a lot... safe travels, alright?

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'made it that far already? Guess Quingees're pretty tough.

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain, friendship with Wander

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: I can prob'ly squeeze you in my backpack if y'really wanna get to the top...

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: No? Not a fan of that idea?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Oh, y'got all the way up the Peak?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Congrats. Y'should take it easy.

after receiving a gift you like.key: after receiving a gift you like

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...Huh? For me?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'sure y'don't want some coin for it?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Thanks. This is pretty nice...

after receiving a gift you don't like.key: after receiving a gift you don't like

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: ...Go toss that somewhere else.

after receiving a gift you're neutral ab.key: after receiving a gift you're neutral about

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: You're givin' this t'me?

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Ha, thanks.

after receiving any gifted fish item.key: after receiving any gifted fish item

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Hey, y'catch this yourself? Not bad.

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: (Wander makes a short whistling sound to get Cashew's attention.)

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: (Wander looks focused as he's drafting up a map...)

chatter 3, after Quingee becomes a regul.key: chatter 3, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: (Wander glances at you, and back to his sketchbook, and back to you, and back to his sketchbook...)

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: See anyone else climb the mountain lately?

chatter 5, after Quingee becomes a regul.key: chatter 5, after Quingee becomes a regular

lines.name: Wander
lines.text: Y'keep on wanting t'climb the peak, ever think 'bout going outta the valley, too?
